text: Image by The Escapist I wanna fly like an Eagle. | Published: Apr 19, 2025 08:31 am Ready to hunt some Birds? Beaks is a fun and colorful Roblox game all about birds, offering a similar vibe to Fisch but with its own unique style. In this game, you can explore, collect, and grow your flock as you soar through different areas. This article covers all the latest codes in Beaks, which can give you helpful boosts and free rewards to make your progress even smoother. All Beaks Codes List Active Beaks Codes The Beaks game is finally out, and it is amazing. But, sadly, it doesn’t seem to have a code redemption system just yet. There’s a good chance the developers will add one soon enough, so you might want to keep this article bookmarked so you can check back for updates. Expired Beaks Codes There are currently no expired Beaks codes. Collect them all! How to Get More Beaks Codes As the game currently does not have any Codes or even a code redemption system, it is hard to say what the best way to get them is. We recommend following the game’s creator, NEKAMI, on Roblox and waiting for updates. What is Beaks? Beaks is a bird-themed Roblox game where you explore different areas, collect different birds, and grow your flock. It shares a similar style and gameplay feel with Fisch, but with its own bird-focused twist. Whether you’re gliding through the air or discovering new species, Beaks offers a relaxing and fun experience. Image by The Escapist

I wanna fly like an Eagle.

|

Published: Apr 19, 2025 08:31 am

Ready to hunt some Birds? Beaks is a fun and colorful Roblox game all about birds, offering a similar vibe to Fisch but with its own unique style. In this game, you can explore, collect, and grow your flock as you soar through different areas. This article covers all the latest codes in Beaks, which can give you helpful boosts and free rewards to make your progress even smoother.

All Beaks Codes List

Active Beaks Codes

The Beaks game is finally out, and it is amazing. But, sadly, it doesn’t seem to have a code redemption system just yet. There’s a good chance the developers will add one soon enough, so you might want to keep this article bookmarked so you can check back for updates.

Expired Beaks Codes

  • There are currently no expired Beaks codes.

How to Get More Beaks Codes

As the game currently does not have any Codes or even a code redemption system, it is hard to say what the best way to get them is. We recommend following the game’s creator, NEKAMI, on Roblox and waiting for updates.

What is Beaks?

Beaks is a bird-themed Roblox game where you explore different areas, collect different birds, and grow your flock. It shares a similar style and gameplay feel with Fisch, but with its own bird-focused twist. Whether you’re gliding through the air or discovering new species, Beaks offers a relaxing and fun experience.

We have a lot more fun and goodies in our Dandy’s World Codes and Project Bronze Forever Codes articles, so head over there to get some freebies.
